title: Bridges Burned and Built
main_plot_points: Confrontation between Andrew and Natalie at their special campus bench
Andrew explains the truth about Anna
Emotional confession of love from Andrew

main.Andrew: Shows courage in confessing his feelings and explaining Anna's role
main.Natalie: Overcomes doubts to trust Andrew and embrace their love

supporting.Anna: Revealed as a mysterious guide rather than romantic interest

future_setup: Clarifies Anna's role in their lives
